misc: Rarely uses his driver, which has raised questions about his masculinity.
biography: Ossi is a highly accomplished golfer who hails from Kullo Golf Club.  He has consistently demonstrated skill and composure on the course, making him a respected competitor in the annual Hector Trophée invitational. His steady presence and strategic approach to the game are hallmarks of his style.

Ossi’s participation in the Hector Trophée spans several years, with notable appearances in 2022, 2024, and 2025. While he's yet to claim victory in the coveted Hector Trophée itself, or the individual Victor trophy, his consistent performance demonstrates a deep understanding of the game and a dedication to improving.

One of the more intriguing aspects of Ossi's game is his infrequent use of the driver. This unconventional approach, while perhaps raising a few eyebrows amongst those who might view this decision as compromising masculinity, allows him to maximize control and accuracy, often leading to lower scores in the long run. Ossi’s unique strategy is a testament to his commitment to finding the most effective method to perform at his peak.
Despite the lack of major tournament victories to date, Ossi remains a player to watch, and his innovative approach to the game makes him a truly compelling participant in the Hector Trophée.
